channel.title: product on Paperchain Blog
channel.description: Recent content in product on Paperchain Blog

item.title: Paperchain Product Update - March 23, 2020
item.description: Improving Integration Workflow This week we’ve updated our integrations workflow with clear and outlined instructions in order for our users to activate it. We currently support YouTube, Fuga, Apple Music, Spotify, Merlin, Pandora etc. Other fixes and improvements Added Terms of Service to Sign-Up form Fixed duplication of chart entries in catalog charts

item.title: Paperchain Product Update - March 16, 2020
item.description: New Sign-up & Sign-in Forms Touched up our Sign-Up and Sign-In forms to make it more intuitive. Users can now pick their account type being ‘Artist’, ‘Record Label’ or ‘Distributor’. We will add more improvements to this in the coming weeks. Issuing Request for an Advance from the Dashboard Users can now request for an advance upto a pre-qualified amount, right from their Paperchain dashboard. This takes into account all of the upcoming receivables an account may have.
